706019f-e.title: Brooklyn: New Lots Avenue - Shepherd Avenue
706019f-e.text:
New Lots Avenue, at the N. E. corner of Shepherd Avenue,
showing the Van Brunt House, one of the oldest in this section of
Brooklyn. It was also known as the William Carel Boerum House and
the Hopkins Farmhouse.
192E
Views 1,2,3,4,5
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
MAY BE REPRODUCED
706019f-e.folder: New Lots Avenue & Shepherd Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706018f.title: Brooklyn: New Lots Avenue - Shepherd Avenue
706018f.text:
New Lots Avenue, at the N. E. corner of Shepherd Avenue,
showing the Van Brunt House, considered one of the oldest in
this section of the borough. It was also known as the Hopkins
Farmhouse and the Boerum House.
About 1922
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
